content.en: Android malware detection: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of different machine learning algorithms in detecting Android malware. They have explored approaches such as Bayesian classification, ensemble learning, and feature fusion to improve accuracy. By combining static and dynamic analysis, a hybrid approach has also been proposed. These studies highlight the potential of machine learning techniques in detecting and preventing malicious behavior in Android applications.
content.da: Android malwaredetektion: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at opdage Android malware. De har udforsket tilgange såsom Bayesiansk klassifikation, ensemble learning og funktionsfusion for at forbedre nøjagtigheden. Ved at kombinere statisk og dynamisk analyse er en hybrid tilgang også blevet foreslået. Disse studier fremhæver potentialet for maskinlæringsteknikker i at opdage og forhindre ondsindet adfærd i Android-applikationer.
